notes.text: SmartFilterBar: REVERTS Saving composite keys in the variant is now supported
ColumnMenu: Implement Accessible Resize Option for m.Table
ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
We've now fixed an issue where the Select All checkbox was disabled by introducing a configurable boolean property
SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
SmartFilterBar: Saving composite keys in the variant is now supported
SmartField: display behaviour is fetched correctly when criticality qualifier is applied
FilterBar: prevent buttons to cover filters
SmartControls: Keyboard Shortcut Documentation articles are now correct
